answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
ICMA collected data most recently on our Police and Fire Personnel and Expenditures Survey in 2011. We can provide the information for those jurisdictions that responded. If you are interested in purchasing the data, please contact sclark@icma.org
Best,
Evelina Moulder

author: Stewart McGehee
text: Do you have a list of US cities by population?  I'm looking for those cities in population order with career fire departments.
title: city populations
